prompt_text: Minimal flat vector logo for Geckio. Modern geometric gecko silhouette formed by smooth, interlocking shapes. Clean sans-serif lowercase wordmark to the right. Subtle negative-space tail curve integrated into the letter g. Balanced and professional look, nature-inspired but modern tech aesthetic.

Detailed vector logo of a stylized gecko outline with subtle body pattern abstraction in light geometry style. Smooth gradients and layered shapes for 3D illusion, still flat vector look. Ideal for hero section or merch.
Simplified flat icon of a curled gecko tail forming a circular swirl, in two-tone minimalist vector style. Clean, centered, single-color outline for favicon usage.

Soft editorial illustration of a small tropical terrarium with branches, moss, and sand. A gecko rests on a piece of driftwood under diffused sunlight. Warm earth tones, sand beige #E7D7B5, moss green #7A8B66, and muted turquoise #B9E2D1 hues. Matte texture, minimal shadows, clean background, no text.

Detailed but soft editorial vector illustration of a crested gecko perched on a branch. Focus on its characteristic eyelashes and prehensile tail. Natural colors (warm tan, light orange, moss green highlights). Diffused daylight, matte surface, light background.

Warm naturalistic illustration of a leopard gecko on sand, with spotted pattern clearly visible. Slight side angle, detailed texture on the skin, subtle soft lighting. Background minimal with pale sand tones and faint plant shadows.

Bright, stylized illustration of a Tokay gecko crawling along bark. Characteristic orange-blue spots on muted turquoise body. Natural matte style, high detail but friendly look suitable for educational pages.

Editorial illustration of a gargoyle gecko with textured rocky background. Focus on head ridges and marbled pattern. Earth brown #9E7C54 and muted green #7A8B66 tones dominate. Clean soft shadow, neutral background #F9F8F3, matte look.

Friendly cartoon-realistic gecko mascot in Geckio colors (sand beige #E7D7B5, moss green #7A8B66, muted turquoise #B9E2D1). Standing upright with expressive eyes and curved tail forming a spiral. Editorial style â€” soft light, matte texture, minimalist background.

Abstract organic background pattern inspired by reptile skin textures and leaf silhouettes. Sand beige #E7D7B5 base with faint moss green #7A8B66 shapes, hand-painted watercolor effect. Clean, seamless loop pattern.
Shallow depth-of-field macro illustration of moss, leaves, and gecko footprint in sand. Natural lighting, warm tones, artistic yet subtle.
